AllowEdit.Name: Allow Editing
AllowEdit.Hint: Allow messages to be edited (via right click).

AppV2.Name: Use ApplicationV2
AppV2.Hint: Use the ApplicationV2 editor with native darkmode support.

Markdown.Name: Markdown Styling
Markdown.Hint: Enable mardown styling of chat messages.

ShowEdited.Name: Show Edited Messages
ShowEdited.Hint: Show a small label on messages that have been edited.
